entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant start generated program on linux (Ubuntu) #63267
  • Publishing a NativeAOT app generates JSON files #63265
  • False positive trim analysis warning despite [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] when using iterator method #63264

Closed

  • Different codegen for ThrowHelper calls with and w/o MethodImplOptions.NoInlining option in .NET6 #63266
  • Strange RegEx performance in .NET 5 #62902

PullRequests

Created

  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Link the aot profiler into dotnet.wasm by default in deb… #63262
    area-Build-mono
  • Use SAL2 _In_, _Out_ to prevent conflicts. #63261
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono][wasm] Remove unused targets from wasm/Makefile. #63263
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1532008 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Compress operand kinds array and optimize `OperIsLocal` #63253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add some diagnostics for EFS tests #63243
    area-System.IO

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit FileTextLoaderOptions.FileLengthThreshold #58553
  • Move InlineHints service OOP #58551
  • Make Extract Method command handler async and move Extract Method service OOP #58550

PullRequests

Created

  • Experimental API idea for incremental generators #58554
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline hints options refactoring #58552
    Area-IDE
  • Extract method options refactoring #58549
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58547
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58546
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double Page Declaration Causes Object Reference Not Set Error #39270
  • Blazor WebAssembly hot reload support broken when changing environment from Development #39269
  • Perf improvement: updates #39268
  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #39264
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #39262
  • SPA proxy stop script fails to run due to incorrect line endings #39261

Closed

  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI to .Net 6 Blazor Webassembly Shared project causes build Error #39263
  • Snapshot debugging encountered error of a referenced type which isn't available #39267
  • [Breaking change]: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and Libuv.dll removed from 7.0 #38022
    Discussions

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in xml comment in GetMultipartBoundary method #39266
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • chore : Remove unwanted `using` statement #39176
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    area-mvc, community-contribution
